DOC.brief_summary: Spinal block lead reduction systemic vascular resistance ( SVR ) may effect cardiac output . Ngan Kee et al . show spina block 0.5 % hyperbaric bupivacaine Cesarean section combine intravenous infusion norepinephrine high cardiac output receive phenylephrine
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Output Changes During Hyperbaric Isobaric Bupivacaine Patients Undergoing Cesarean Section
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiology classification I II Elective urgency Cesarean section spinal block e.g . cephalopelvic disproportion , premature rupture membrane Singleton pregnancy Body mass index < 40 kg/m2 Pregnancy < 35 week gestational age Hypertensive disease e.g . gestational hypertension , chronic hypertension , preeclampsia History allergy study drug
